parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle in Vehicle Transport

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Load cargo vehicle inside vehicle if possible, returns bool based on whether the vehicle was able to be loaded.  Can also be used to unload a specific loaded vehicle or all loaded vehicles.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[setVehicleCargo]] cargo

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle carrying cargo

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  cargo: [[Object]] - cargo to put in vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - whether the vehicle was able to be loaded

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Blackfish with no vehicle cargo loaded
<code>_success = blackfish [[setVehicleCargo]] offroad; //true
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Blackfish with full cargo already loaded
<code>_success = blackfish [[setVehicleCargo]] offroad; //false
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Unload specific loaded vehicle
<code>_success = [[objNull]] [[setVehicleCargo]] offroad; 
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Unload all vehicles
<code>_success = blackfish [[setVehicleCargo]] [[objNull]];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma_3_Vehicle_in_Vehicle_Transport| Vehicle in Vehicle Transport ]] [[canVehicleCargo]] [[enableVehicleCargo]] [[getVehicleCargo]] [[isVehicleCargo]] [[vehicleCargoEnabled]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<dd class="note">

"objnull setVehicleCargo cargo vehicle - will unload specific loaded vehicle" and "transporting vehicle setVehicleCargo objnul - unload all vehicles"
</dd>
</dl>
